name: Dungeon Runes
description:
Dungeon Runes was made for the Ludum Dare 36 Game Jam in 2016. It features puzzles, traps, and secrets in an action-packed first person dungeon crawling style. Your goal is to collect three ancient runes, discover their powers which may help you throughout the course of the game, and escape.

Remember that if a chamber seems too difficult to get through, you can come back to it later with more runes that may help you.

Any and all feedback is greatly appreciated. Enjoy!

(Keep in mind this game is not exactly well optimized and may run slowly on some computers. Turning down the quality options may help with this issue.)
